Translations.Text: ane temani aju baju nana nana balako cali phari rahya hase. Jeva ke te'o moti hata je dhankela rakhya hata
ane andara andara eka-bijathi savala karase
kahese ke a pahela apane potana gharavala'othi khuba ja darata hata
basa! Allaha ta'ala'e amara upara khuba ja upakara karyo ane amane jhadapi garama hava'oni yatanathi bacavi lidha
ame pahelathi ja teni bandagi karata hata, ni:Sanka te upakari ane dayaluche
to tame samajavata raho, karanake tame potana palanaharani krpathi na to jyotisa cho ane na to pagala
sum inkari'o kahe che ke a kavi che? Ame tena para jamanani durghatanani (mrtyu) vata jo'i rahya che
kahim do! Tame pratiksa karo, hum pana tamari sathe pratiksa karanaro chum
sum te'one temani budhdhi avum ja sikhavade che athava to a ja loko balavakhora che
sum a loko kahe che ke a payagambare (kura'ana) pote ghadi kadhyum che? Vata evi che ke te imana nathi lavata
ham! Jo a loko sacca hoya to ana jevi eka (ja) vata to la'i ave
sum a loko ko'i sarjana karanara vagara jate ja peda tha'i gaya che? Athava to a pote sarjana karanara che
sum temane ja akasa ane dharatine peda karya che? Parantu a yakina na karavavala'o che
Athava sum temani pase tara palanaharana khajana che? Athava (te khajanana) dekharekha rakhanara che
athava to sum temani pase ko'i sidi che jena para cadhine avya che? (Jo avum ja che) to temano ko'i sambhalanara khulli dalila ape
sum allaha mate to putri'o che? Ane tamara tyam putro che
sum tame te lokothi ko'i mahenatanu iccho cho? Jethi a loko tena bharathi dabayela hoya
sum te loko pase adrasyanum jnana che? Jene te'o lakhi rahya hoya
sum a loko ko'i cala ramava icche che? Tame nisrcita tha'i java cala calanara (loko) inkari'o che
sum allaha sivaya te'ono ko'i ma'abuda (sacco pujya) che? (Kadapi nahim) allaha ta'ala te'ona bhagidaro theravavathi pavitra che
jo a loko akasana ko'i tukadane (dharati para) padato jo'i le, to pana ama ja kahese ke a to eka pachi eka vadala che
tame te'one chodi do, tyam sudhi ke te'o te divasane jo'i le je divase te'o behosa kari nakhavamam avase
je divase te'one temani cala ko'i kama nahim ave ane na to temane madada karavamam avase
ni:Sanka atyacari'o mate a sivaya biji ghani yatana'o pana che. Parantu te lokomam vadhare loko abhana che
tame potana palanaharana adesani pratiksamam dhairya vade kama lo, ni:Sanka tame amari ankho same savare jyare na utho potana palanaharani pavitrata ane prasansa bayana karo
ane ratre pana tena namanum smarana karo ane tara'o athamavana samaye pana
soganda che tara'ona jyare te pade
tamara sathi na to rastathi bhatakela che ane na to pathabhrasta che
ane na potani iccha pramane ko'i vata kari che
te to phakata vahi che je utaravamam ave che
(vahi) ne takatavara pharista'e sikhavadyum che
Je saktisali che. Pachi te sidho ubho tha'i gayo
ane te unca akasana kinara para hato
pachi najika thayo ane utari avyo
basa! Te be kamanona barabara jagya rahi ga'i. Tenathi pana ochi
basa! Tene allahana bandane vahi pahoncadi je kami pana pahoncadyu
hrdaye juthum na theravyu je kami (payagambare) joyu
sum tame jhadhado karo cho teni sathe? Je (payagambara) ju'e che
(jibra'ila) ne tame biji vakhata pana joya hata
sidaratul muntaha pase
teni ja pase jannatul ma'ava che
jyare ke sidarahane chupayeli hati, te vastu je chupavavamam avi rahi hati
na to najhara hati na to hadathi vadhi
ni;sanka tene potana palanaharani moti moti nisani'omanthi ketalika nisani'o jo'i lidhi
sum tame lata ane ujhjhane joya
ane manat je trija che
sum tamara mate putro ane allaha mate putri'o che
a to have khuba ja an'yaya ni vata che

kharekhara a to eka nama che, je tame ane tamara bapa-dada'o'e (nama) rakhi lidha che. Allaha ta'ala'e te'ona ko'i purava nathi utaraya, a loko to phakata atakalo upara potani manacahata pachala padela che ane kharekhara temana palanahara taraphathi temani pase satya margadarsana avi pahoncyum che
sum dareka vyakti je icche tene malyum che
allahana ja hathamam che a jagata ane te jagata
